targets.expr: sum(rate(BENTOML_request_total{namespace="$namespace", yatai_ai_bento_deployment=~"$bento_deployment", http_response_code!~"[4-5].*", exported_endpoint!="/", exported_endpoint!="/docs.json", exported_endpoint!="/robots.txt", exported_endpoint!~"/static_content/.*"}[2m])) / sum(rate(BENTOML_request_total{namespace="$namespace", yatai_ai_bento_deployment=~"$bento_deployment", exported_endpoint!="/", exported_endpoint!="/docs.json", exported_endpoint!="/robots.txt", exported_endpoint!~"/static_content/.*"}[2m]))

sum by(exported_endpoint) (BENTOML_request_in_progress{namespace="$namespace", yatai_ai_bento_deployment=~"$bento_deployment", exported_endpoint!="/", exported_endpoint!="/docs.json", exported_endpoint!="/robots.txt", exported_endpoint!~"/static_content/.*"})

sum(rate(BENTOML_request_total{namespace="$namespace", yatai_ai_bento_deployment=~"$bento_deployment", http_response_code!~"[4-5].*", exported_endpoint!="/", exported_endpoint!="/docs.json", exported_endpoint!="/robots.txt", exported_endpoint!~"/static_content/.*"}[2m])) / sum(rate(BENTOML_request_total{namespace="$namespace", yatai_ai_bento_deployment=~"$bento_deployment", exported_endpoint!="/", exported_endpoint!="/docs.json", exported_endpoint!="/robots.txt", exported_endpoint!~"/static_content/.*"}[2m]))

sum(rate(BENTOML_request_total{namespace="$namespace", yatai_ai_bento_deployment=~"$bento_deployment", http_response_code!~"[4-5].*", exported_endpoint!="/", exported_endpoint!="/docs.json", exported_endpoint!="/robots.txt", exported_endpoint!~"/static_content/.*"}[2m])) by (exported_endpoint) / sum(rate(BENTOML_request_total{namespace="$namespace", yatai_ai_bento_deployment=~"$bento_deployment", exported_endpoint!="/", exported_endpoint!="/docs.json", exported_endpoint!="/robots.txt", exported_endpoint!~"/static_content/.*"}[2m])) by (exported_endpoint)

histogram_quantile(0.5, sum(rate(BENTOML_request_duration_seconds_bucket{namespace="$namespace", yatai_ai_bento_deployment=~"$bento_deployment", http_response_code=~"2.*", exported_endpoint!="/", exported_endpoint!~"/static_content/.*", exported_endpoint!="/docs.json", exported_endpoint!="/robots.txt"}[2m])) by (le, exported_endpoint))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(BENTOML_request_duration_seconds_bucket{namespace="$namespace", yatai_ai_bento_deployment=~"$bento_deployment", http_response_code=~"2.*", exported_endpoint!="/", exported_endpoint!~"/static_content/.*", exported_endpoint!="/docs.json", exported_endpoint!="/robots.txt"}[2m])) by (le, exported_endpoint))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(BENTOML_request_duration_seconds_bucket{namespace="$namespace", yatai_ai_bento_deployment=~"$bento_deployment", http_response_code=~"2.*", exported_endpoint!="/", exported_endpoint!~"/static_content/.*", exported_endpoint!="/docs.json", exported_endpoint!="/robots.txt"}[2m])) by (le, exported_endpoint))
